Responsive helpers

Show/hide content depending on the width of the viewport

  • Syntax
  • Helpers
  • Responsive helpers
  • Color helpers
  • Typography helpers

Show #

You can use one of the following display classes:

  • block
  • flex
  • inline
  • inline-block
  • inline-flex

For example, here's how the is-flex helper works:
